name: TalkTime
0:
”Alexa, open Talk Time”
”Talk Time”
”Alexa, ask Talk Time about "whatever you want!"”
skdetail:
Rated: Mature. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: talk time
Developer Terms of Use
des:
Step into a world of engaging conversations with Talk Time, the ultimate companion for your Alexa, powered by ChatGPT. 

You can chat to Talk Time about anything, whether you want to uncover intriguing facts from history or science, or simply enjoy some light-hearted banter. 

It's designed to be both informative and entertaining, blending insightful discussions with playful exchanges. Whether you have a question, want to get an opinion, talk about your feelings, or even hear a good joke, Talk Time is here for you.

With Talk Time you can personalize your chats by setting a unique persona. Simply say 'configure me' and tell us the personality you'd like - be it a classic detective, techie geek, rock legend or even a famous person, it’ll almost be like chatting to a real person (well, kind of 😂).

Rest assured, your chats remain private as we do not record or monitor your conversations. 

Have fun! 

Available on smart speakers like Echo, Sonos, and Bose. Audio only.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
